=======================================
Examples
=======================================


Fitting exoplanet photometry and RV
---------------------------------------

### `examples/crash_course/`

### `examples/TMNT/`
Various different fitting scenarios and different settings for the TMNT data set.

### `examples/simulate_data/`
How the TMNT data set was simulated.
